title: Rahu Transit in the 8th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 8th house for Scorpio Ascendant, deep transformation, secrecy, and sudden shifts intensify. This phase heightens interest in hidden knowledge, research, psychology, and taboo subjects. Joint finances, inheritances, or debts may fluctuate unexpectedly, requiring caution and transparency. Emotional fears can surface, pushing inner transformation. Power struggles or obsessive thinking are possible if boundaries blur. When navigated consciously, this transit unlocks profound insight, crisis-handling ability, and regenerative strength after upheaval.

points: Attraction toward the hidden and unknown

closing: This Rahu transit forces deep inner change. With awareness and ethical clarity, it transforms crisis into profound strength and insight.
